3: Are you ready, Lucia?
Ready. Lee, activate the tactical terminal.
Understood.
Here's the thing, Commandant.
I'd ask Lee to organize relevant information of this stage into a copy of readable data.
While Lee activates the tactical terminal, I'll upload our data to the terminal to save time for explanation.
Thank you, Commandant.
The memory prototype of this mission is Athmail, once the captain of the vanguard squad of Moe Army, and one of the generals of Marshal Cottie.
Vanguard... such a familiar combat type. I've got a hunch that he'll be a trouble.
You...
Hi, we're the Gray Raven.
Please explain to me what's with that World Government?
The World Government is a global unified government created by 'Dominik' the hero to unite the power of all mankind...
So, what about the marshal's Moe Army?
According to history, your organization existed until the World Government is formed and was probably absorbed by it along with other organizations.
Are you saying that the Moe Army, us, have all become the ashes of history?
No... it's not like that.
I believe you know it better than anyone the importance of peace and unity in the world.
At least, with the World Government, you won't have to fight for the rights and interests of LOLI any more.
Please adapt to the changes of the times at ease.
...I understand it. But I can't calm down!
No!
Ka-cha—

4: Is this also a part of the routine...

3: Yeah, it's a part of it.
Alright, memory: Athmail. Test passed and recycle completed.
...Is this really okay?
The well-preserved parts of the Moe Army... are something important...
Commandant, the record of our battles, and the idea of fighting for something to protect... are not completely gone.
Alright!
